segments.text: Can you help me with my timesheet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure ! I can help you . Do you know where the timesheets are kept ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't know where to find one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , once you get one off the shelf over there , you first put your name on it . OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now you have to fill in the hours in the blanks and total the hours for the week . Do you know how to use military time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't know what that is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , so we just start counting hours at midnight and record it . Show all minutes as a dot and then write how many minutes . OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I understand how to do this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: After you total your hours , make sure you sign it and turn it in to your supervisor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good luck and let me know if you need any help later on .
segments.speaker: S2
